string-array.name: training_errors
string-array.item: "Sorry, you are speaking a little too slowly. Please speak more quickly."
"Sorry, you are speaking a little too quickly. Please speak more slowly."

You are speaking too quietly.
Please speak up a little.

You are speaking too loud.
Please hold the phone a bit farther away or speak more softly.
"Sorry, your launch phrase is too short. Make sure you are saying OK Google Now."
"Sorry, your launch phrase is too long. Make sure you are just saying OK Google Now."
"It's a little loud in here. Please find a silent place and try again."
"Sorry, it seems you paused while speaking the launch phrase. Please say OK Google Now as a single phrase."
"Sorry, your phrase doesn't sound like OK Google Now. Please try again."
"Sorry, your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over…"
"Sorry, your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over…"
"Sorry, I didn't catch that. Please say OK Google Now again…"
"Sorry, I didn't catch that. Please say OK Google Now again…"
"After checking your phrase more closely, it appears to be too long. Try something shorter"
"Oops… You are speaking the phrase a little too soon. Pause before saying OK Google Now."
"Oops… There's some extra noise at the end of the phrase. Be sure to keep quiet after saying OK Google Now."
"Sorry, I didn't catch that. Let's start over and try OK Google Now again."
"Sorry, I didn't catch that. Let's start over and try OK Google Now again."
"Sorry, something went wrong. Let's start over…"
"Sorry, I wasn't able to verify the launch phrase. Let's try OK Google Now again."
"Sorry, something went wrong. Let's start over…"
"Sorry, I'm having trouble. Let's start over. Please make sure you're saying OK Google Now clearly…"
"Sorry, something went wrong. Let's start over…"
"It's a little loud in here. Please find a silent place and start over…"
"Sorry, training can not be completed with a wired headset. Please unplug your headset and try again."
Oops. We were interrupted. Please continue now.
"Sorry, your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over…"
"Sorry, your phrase doesn't sound like OK Google Now. Please try again."
"Training can't be completed while the phone is playing music."
"Sorry, training can't be completed while on the phone. Please wait until your call is finished and try again later.…"
"Sorry, training can't be completed while an alarm is playing. Please dismiss the alarm and try again later.…"
"Sorry, training can't be completed while the phone is on the table. Please pick up the phone and try again."
The recording has been interrupted.

string-array.name: udt_training_errors
string-array.item: "You're speaking a little too slowly. Please speak more quickly."
"You're speaking a little too quickly. Please speak more slowly."
"You're speaking too quietly. Please speak up a little."
"You're speaking too loudly. Please hold the phone a bit further away or speak more quietly."
It seems you paused while speaking the launch phrase. Please say a single phrase.
"Didn't catch that. Try speaking more clearly."
It sounds like you added extra syllables. Please say just \"Ok Google\"
You said \"Ok Google\" a little too soon. Pause before saying it.
"There's some extra noise at the end \"Ok Google\" Be sure to stay quiet for a moment after saying it."
"Your recordings didn't match closely enough. Please try them again."
"Something went wrong. Let's start over."
"Your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over."
"Your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over."
"Your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over."
"Your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over."
"Your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over."
"Sorry, didn't catch that. Let's start over."
"Sorry, didn't catch that. Let's start over."
"Sorry, didn't catch that. Let's start over."
"Sorry, something went wrong. Let's start over."
There was trouble hearing your voice. Please try again.
"Training can't be completed with a wired headset. Please unplug your headset and try again."
There was an interruption. Please start over.
"Your recordings don't match closely enough. Let's start over."
We were interrupted. Please continue now.
"Training can't be completed while the phone is playing music."
"Training can't be completed while on the phone. Please finish your call and try again."
"Training can't be completed while an alarm is playing. Please stop the alarm and try again."
The recording has been interrupted.
There was some extra noise in the recording. Please try again.
"Didn't catch that. Try speaking more clearly."
"Training can't be completed while the phone is on the table. Please pick up device to continue."
Your recordings were a bit too quiet. Please try again and speak up a little.
The timing was a little off in your recordings. Please try them again.
Your recordings had some extra noise. Please say the phrases again cleanly.
There was trouble hearing your voice. Please try recording again.
Your recordings were a bit too loud. Please try them again.
"Your recordings didn't match closely enough. Please try them again."
There was an interruption. Please try recording again.

string-array.name: noise_errors
string-array.item: "Great! You found a quiet place. Let's continue."
"It's a little too noisy. Find a quiet place to continue."
"It's way too loud. Find a quiet place to continue."
